title: Life on Mars? NASA’s Rover Helps Us Find It.
description: Rocks collected by Perseverance are filled with organic molecules, and they formed in a lake that would have been habitable a few billion years ago.
dc:creator: Kenneth Chang
media:description: A composite image taken by NASA’s Perseverance rover showing its robotic arm over a rocky area called Skinner Ridge in Jezero Crater on Mars.
